data.text: @stephenpollard I think the 41 million Ukrainians should get an equally share of their countries wealth. No chance of that happening, if Putin doesn't get what he thinks is his share, who'll get it.I think I could guess..  but I'll follow the money,bet my guess is not wrong

@stephenpollard @DPJHodges I agree, Fox is the very worst example of getting where he has on the back of his family name rather than talent which in turn has given him a platform he otherwise never would have had. 

And yet he still manages go talk more sense on NFZs than Dan Hodges.
@itsocheagain @stephenpollard He mocks only those deserving of mockery.
@stephenpollard Excuse me but calling people thick ? Picking on people who are not on the same “intellectual” level as you is not nice. Remember: You are unique, the same as everyone else 😂

@stephenpollard FYI Covid IS sightly less lethal than flu, see latest ONS figures. Rather than calling LF thick, why not debate his points, obviously with your sagacious intellect, it’ll be a walkover?

@stephenpollard Problem is Stephen you have openly  mocking people who had a different opinion then you on Covid. People against Lockdowns you mocked, against masks you mocked 

Which puts you into the “awful” category as well…
